predicate.note: Frames file for 'beset' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: Wang Laboratories Inc. , Lowell , Mass. , [*-1] beset [*] by declining demand for its computers , reported a $ 62.1 million [*U*] , 38-cents-a-share loss in its first quarter ended Sept. 30 .
